If you still encounter an issue with the app, don't hesitate to get in touch with us at support@getpaired.com. ", 'modified': '2021-04-28T17:25:43Z'}
review: My Fiancé and I do these questions daily and we have our convos afterwards sharing our thoughts. We enjoy the quizzes most but the little prompts are good too. Anyways, I completed a quiz today it was 8 questions and it had to do with conflict, I answered with agree/strongly agree and when it loaded my results it had all disagree..... hm why is that? there has to be a glitch or something going on, im not sure yall are the tech team. I don't want to delete this app, we both enjoy it. BUT when it does something like this and doesn't generate the correct results it conflicts the actual data on our profiles. In all I am disappointed and hope for better in the future with the updates...
title: To delete or not to delete 🤷🏾‍♂️

developerResponse: {'id': 26189936, 'body': "Thanks so much for your lovely review! 🥰 We're so pleased you're enjoying using Paired. I hope we can help bring you and your partner even closer together. 💜 If there's anything we can do for you, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at support@getpaired.com.", 'modified': '2021-11-10T10:09:39Z'}
review: Paired is super cute and interesting. My Boyfriend and I downloaded it as a bit of a joke but it turned out we really liked it! The app has made us learn so much about each other and i like it a ton! My favorite are the packs with the multiple write in answers. I feel like every one of them are carefully curated to give the most information about each other. I also really like the daily question aspect. It makes us put in an effort daily to learn something new about each other. 10/10 highly recommend
title: Excellent App!

developerResponse: {'id': 26825932, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you were having issues with the app. We hope this has been resolved by now but please feel free to get back in touch if you need anything else 🙌", 'modified': '2021-12-14T11:22:37Z'}
review:
Love this app and happily paid for the year subscription for me and my partner. But today, she has no access to it and I un-paired her to re-pair her and we lost all of our progress and chats. Needless to say I cancelled my re-subscription and am pretty frustrated that only a week into it, immediately after the free 7 days, we are now having issues. 

I've contacted support but am pretty disappointed that a company that is charging this price doesn't even have a phone number to call so there's no way to get even immediate help on something that could probably be fixed within a few minutes and I'll have to wait probably days just to get a small issue resolved. 

Bummer. This was going really well. It's unfortunate that it's leaving a bad taste in my mouth so soon into even using the app. 

Two stars because I love what this is about and loved the app itself when I actually worked, but because it's so soon into use and I've already paid for a whole year and lost all progress, I can't justify giving it a better rating at this time. I'm disappointed.
title: I'm a bit disappointed

developerResponse: {'id': 33836965, 'body': "I'm sorry to hear you had issues with your free trial and its automated renewal. Please note that Paired teams don't have access to Apple's billing platform, which is why our dedicated support team wasn't able to issue a refund for you. It looks like you encountered a bug where you weren't able to cancel your trial in the app - this should now be fixed and shouldn't occur again.\nIf there's anything you need at all, please don't hesitate to let us know at support@paired.com", 'modified': '2022-12-20T16:33:45Z'}
review: There’s a free trail period so my partner and I tried that then when we determined we didn’t like it I wanted to cancel. The app told me under “manage subscription” that he was in charge of it so he canceled it. I then checked mine to see if I would now be able to cancel and it still said he was in charge of the subscription. Then the day after the free trail period they charged me 79$! I wasn't able to cancel it on my end until they charged me. The “contact support” is just FAQs and there was an option for being charged and wanting a refund which they said I had to dispute the charge with apple and somehow they aren’t responsible!! This app was designed this way to scam people out of money and the “free trial” is not free because they are sneaky and will charge you anyways. Don’t get it!!!!!
title: SCAM

developerResponse: {'id': 33837382, 'body': "Thank you so much for your feedback - this is extremely valuable to us 💜 We're glad to hear that using Paired has helped you and your wife throughout these recent changes in your relationship. \nWe've made some improvements to the performances of the app lately - if you're still having latency issues, don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com so we can investigate it further together 🙏", 'modified': '2022-12-20T16:51:06Z'}
review:
A lot of this app seems focused on couples who have no children in the mix
My wife and i are using the app to try to fix a few snags in our relationship that has popped up with her getting a new job in another state and myself staying behind for our high schooler and autistic elementary child to retain their friends and supports. And it’s really shown where we lacked and need improvement on. But since this last chat update the responsiveness of the app has gone to crap and half of it wont load. So right now my wife and i broke our 110day streak cause its just awful to use now.
title: Has its ups and downs

review: I actually enjoy Paired and I think it is an effective app at strengthening communication. It’s also good for those that have been together a while because it asks specific questions that let the other person open up. However, basically the entire app is behind a paywall. You and your partner get 1 free “interaction” per day, and it’s predetermined by the app what that prompt will be. There’s also no way to watch an ad to potentially unlock a prompt, which is sort of a shame because the free interactions seem a little bit more surface level and in order to unlock the really thought provoking or engaging sections you must pay.
title: Love the app, hate the paywall

review: My fiancé wasn’t raised to talk about his feelings or show much emotion.  I think he struggles with it when I try to talk to him face to face.  I got paired to create a fun and safe avenue to talk about things in our relationship.  He answers questions, and does the quizzes, but the only place to reflect on the answers is in one chat window.  The problem is, I have done several more quizzes and questions than he has, and he comes in behind me and chooses what he wants to answer after me.  I wish there was a dedicated spot in each quiz/question/conversation to reflect on just that one question rather than everything getting mangled together in one section.
title: Needing a little more

developerResponse: {'id': 26063260, 'body': "Thanks so much for your lovely review! 🙌  We're glad you're enjoying using our app and hope we can help you connect with your partner every day. Thanks for being part of our community and sharing your Golden Ticket with your friends 💜  If there's anything you need, you can always shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com 🙏", 'modified': '2021-11-03T16:58:21Z'}
review: I downloaded this app for me and my husband to better communicate. It has been detrimental in learning more about each other. My favorite part is that some of the questions are things you wouldn’t think to ask and that’s the best part. I’ve even earned a golden ticket and shared with some friends who are in relationships. Overall I’m very pleased and thankful for this app. My ONLY request is that a filter can be added. In terms of the question packs that don’t apply to our relationship. Other than that... 10/10
title: Love this app!!!

review: I personally really like the app. My girlfriend and I will answer the questions while on the phone and it makes me smile and giggle when she sees my answers or she’ll let out an “awwwee” and it’s the most adorable thing ever. The only complaint I have is that today even right now it won’t let me use the quiz part. It is frozen. I can’t scroll and pick a quiz or a question. But I can use every other part just fine. Still one of the best apps. It makes her and I both happy and I thank the developers for that.
title: Amazing app

review: Lots of fun daily questions, quizzes, and games you can play with your partner! Some questions were pretty easy, but some delved into some stuff we disagreed and talked over. I think it’s helpful to discuss this stuff, especially if you’re in a committed relationship! It also gets into intimate/18+ stuff, which is nice too! The app does have some bugs or glitches though, so it’s not the most polished, but the content is good! I reported a bug before and their support team was very helpful! The upfront (yearly) cost is a bit high though, but thankfully, they have a trial period to see if you like it!
title: Very nice

developerResponse: {'id': 35631705, 'body': "Thanks a lot for taking the time to share your thoughts about Paired! We're glad to hear that you're enjoying using Paired with your partner and it's helping you learn more about each other 💜 We're currently working on reviewing the way notifications work in the app - we'll make note of your feedback while working on reviewing this feature 🙏 If there's anything else you'd like to share, please shoot us a note at support@paired.com! \n\n", 'modified': '2023-03-28T10:14:14Z'}
review:
We love the app so far.

 I do wish the notifications were a bit better. Every time I get notified he has answered it is in multiples. When I click on one, all the other notifications disappear and then I’m left digging to find which one he answered. 

Other than that, I really enjoy it. It has made me think more in depth about what I could do better. It has also allowed us to open up about silly things we didn’t know about each other. Overall, it is just a good starter and doesn’t focus on all the negatives of a relationship. It encourages good conversations.
title: Loving so far

review: Maybe we’re not the target audience, but my spouse and I have been together 11 years. We thought this would be a fun way to spice up our conversations and give us new things to talk about over dinner. But most of the questions are extremely basic and things that anyone whose been together a few years should know about their spouse. Additionally, the app is incredibly buggy and often struggles to save answers or to recognize when it’s a new day and time for a new question. If a young couple is just starting out, this might be fun, but for long term couples who already have good communication , I don’t think it does much.
title: Just Okay

developerResponse: {'id': 26190084, 'body': "We're so sorry to hear you were having issues with the app! Please feel free to send an email to support@getpaired.com with your Paired ID so we can help out 🙏", 'modified': '2021-11-10T10:17:15Z'}
review:
I was sent a link from a friend who had paid for the subscription. It allowed me and my bf access to use the app freely but just warned that we’d be charged if we went over the month’s free trial. 

Since me and my bf weren’t really keeping up with it I tried to cancel through the app. It kept telling me there was an error. Everything else worked just fine besides attempting to cancel my free trial. Seems suspicious to me. 
So I deleted the app and of course I was charged $75 for it even though I’ve tried canceling numerous times. It didn’t give me the option to unsubscribe through my settings either since it was sent through my friend’s link. So the application was the only way to cancel and of course that part wouldn’t work.
title: Questionable methods to get subscriptions
userName: i wish i never tried this

developerResponse: {'id': 33837010, 'body': "Thanks for giving Paired a try. I'm sorry you didn't enjoy your experience. We do, on the free version, have a question available per day and a quiz on Sundays. But if you do want to access all content available in the app, you will need to subscribe to the premium version. We've tried to set a price that is both fair and representative of the expert content we've created with therapists and academics to make sure that we can help couples invest more in their relationship. If you feel that this isn't the case and you can spare a few minutes to share your feedback with us, please shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com. Thanks!\xa0\n", 'modified': '2022-12-20T16:36:08Z'}
review: Ive been asked more interesting questions from my Dentist. I had originally downloaded the app as a way for me and my partner to find things out we didn’t necessarily know about each other. After about a year of doing the daily questions/quizzes, This app is completely useless and anybody that pays for this is a total sucker. Are these questions made by high schoolers? Corny questions on what makes a perfect date, when was the last time your partner made you laugh, what kind of pet people are you, etc. If any of you don’t know the answers to these things about your partner, just end the thing and move on. Elementary level app with bourgeoisie price tag. Better off using the $6 to wipe your bum with after going to the bathroom.
title: Dull app for Lackluster People

developerResponse: {'id': 33838060, 'body': "Thanks a lot for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. I understand you'd like to be able to add your own answers to Games and their multiple choice questions - I passed this on to our dedicated team for further review 🙏 In the meantime, if you update your all, you'll see a new General Chat added to the Discuss tab so that you and your partner can resume a continuous conversation on the app. For any other comments, don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com!", 'modified': '2022-12-20T17:32:56Z'}
review:
I love the questions and quizzes. What I don’t love is the inability to write in your own answer for a quiz - and then just apply a logic that takes out that from the scoring - because I think more often than not, the choices don’t apply to either one of us. If the actual goal is to facilitate growth and understanding within a relationship, the choices for the quizzes feel like they’re written by someone who’s never been in a relationship in their entire life.

Furthermore, now that there’s a separate chat for each question or quiz, it takes away that ability to have a continuous discussion all around.
title: Pricy but worth it sometimes

developerResponse: {'id': 29455504, 'body': "Thank you so much for your feedback 🥰 It's a pleasure to hear that Paired has been helping you in your long-distance relationship and I wish you many more meaningful conversations with your partner 💜\nIf there's anything else you'd like to share, feel free to get in touch at support@paired.com 🙏", 'modified': '2022-04-28T16:47:09Z'}
review: Being in a long distance relationship requires a lot of conscious effort to remain connected regularly and to keep the attraction and the motivation high it’s necessary not to find yourself in monotonous patterns. This app has been amazing at prompting the questions we don’t think to ask when we finally get the calls at the end of the day or the meetings in person every few months, but we are enjoying the benefits of the deeper connection during these times.
title: Motivation to stay connected

developerResponse: {'id': 38174373, 'body': "Hi there,\nWe're sorry to hear that your previous answers were still in the app when you paired with another user. When pairing with someone new, most of your answers get reset automatically, but answers to some quizzes persist — while we work on improving this, don't hesitate to create a new account to start afresh! Please email us at support@paired.com for any further questions; our team will be more than happy to assist you.", 'modified': '2023-08-08T17:04:51Z'}
review:
I had the app years ago with a different partner. When we broke up, we both unpaired and deleted our accounts. Flash forward to now, happy with a new partner, I decide to redownload and try it out. I create my account again, invite my partner, all is well. That was last night. This morning I wake up to find ALL OF MY OLD ANSWERS still attached to my account, and my partner has seen three of them and responded to them. But it was from my last relationship. 

I am panicked, I am mortified, I am appalled at the lack of privacy or concern in this area as there is no way to undo or start fresh apparently. You just have to permanently delete your account. Just an awful and humiliating design flaw.
title: App shows all your old relationship answers to new partners

developerResponse: {'id': 35632116, 'body': "Thanks a lot for sharing this thorough feedback with us. We've made recent changes and improvements to the different tabs of the app, including the Discuss Tab. On top of that, our teams are currently working on updating the way notifications work, so that you can enable the notifications that are the most relevant for you and your partner. Please bear with us while we work on these changes, and feel free to email us at support@paired.com if you have further questions! ", 'modified': '2023-03-28T10:35:13Z'}
review: The questions are good, but the recent updates really made this not worth the huge price. The questions don’t populate reliably in the results page, making it useless because I don’t remember the questions I’m seeing the answers to. It’s also so hard to understand/see when my partner has answered a prompt because the badge notification is pushed daily regardless of my partners’ activity. The most important part -the “discuss” page- is so confusing and I can’t tell which prompts have and have not been completed/viewed. And I can’t leave on push notifications to get notified when my partner responds because of frequent dumb notifications I don’t care about. Please make this app useful again! It was fun
title: Bugs and bad UI update

developerResponse: {'id': 27036790, 'body': "Hi there, sorry about that! This bug has now been fixed - if the app is up to date and you're still encountering these issues, please contact us at support@getpaired.com 🙌", 'modified': '2021-12-24T13:02:58Z'}
review:
This may just be for iOS, as it doesn’t appear my partner is having an issue. After my partner completes a quiz of question and we both have answers, it takes so long for me to be able to see it. He can see the results instantly. But even after closing the app, toggling between tabs, and clicking directly on the notification that says answers are ready, the page will tell me I’m still waiting for answers.

It’s a small thing as I describe it but the content of app means nothing if I can’t full use it or engage with my a partner.. especially at the price point for premium.
title: The app content and features are great but

developerResponse: {'id': 32624313, 'body': "Thanks for giving Paired a try. I'm sorry you didn't enjoy your experience. We do, on the free version, have a question available per day and a quiz on Sundays. But if you do want to access all content available in the app, you will need to subscribe to the premium version. We've tried to set a price that is both fair and representative of the expert content we've created with therapists and academics to make sure that we can help couples invest more in their relationship. If you feel that this isn't the case and you can spare a few minutes to share your feedback with us, please shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com. Thanks!\xa0\n", 'modified': '2022-10-17T16:16:29Z'}
review: Theres only like two things you can do in free mode while there are hundreds if you pay. 50 dollars though? The free version makes me not even want to use the app. How am I supposed to get interested when i get two welcome activities then there is literally nothing else i can do. 50 dollars would make more sense if the user actually had time to use it for free with multiple things to do for a while first then sign up later. Its still expensive though for just a bunch of questions. Advertisements make it seem like you can do alot but you cant. Waste to download if you want a fun app for couples. Which btw its not the type of app that should be 50 bucks. Maybe 10-20. User beware.
title: Nothing to actually do in free mode

developerResponse: {'id': 29153399, 'body': "Thanks a lot for your review! We're so happy you're enjoying using Paired and finding it helpful. Paired doesn't support having multiple partners in the app, but I'll make sure to pass on your feedback to the relevant teams so we can look into it for our upcoming projects 🙏 If there's anything else you'd like to share, feel free to email us at support@paired.com - we'd be thrilled to talk to you some more 🙌", 'modified': '2022-04-13T16:12:08Z'}
review: One of my partners and I are really enjoying learning about one another in this app. I love everything about the games and the questions. It is well thought out and plenty to do (we purchased the premium plan). I am in a closed triad, however, and we would love to do this with our other partner too. I know it’s called Paired… lol - but I would love for an opportunity to add multiple partners. Would totally give five stars if I could add a second (or more) partners. Wondering if there is a way for me to make a secondary account to use with my other partner. 🤔
title: Obsessed, but wishing it was Poly friendly!

developerResponse: {'id': 26037882, 'body': "We're so sorry to hear you were having issues with the app! Please feel free to send another email to support@getpaired.com with your Paired ID so we can help out 🙏", 'modified': '2021-11-02T14:09:40Z'}
review: So this app is fun, and the concept is good. $75 for a year subscription is a little steep, but I got it as a gift for my boyfriend since the promo said it was $75 for both of us. Well, since then he has had issues accessing the premium even though we have been paired from the start of it. I reached out to their team and all they were saying was to update the app or reinstall. Finally they told us to just unpair from each other and then re-pair. We did that, and then 7 days later, my partner was charged $75 dollars?? There have just been so many issues with trying to get it to work for both of us, that I don’t think it’s worth the money.
title: Too many problems

developerResponse: {'id': 31345653, 'body': "I'm sorry to hear you've been having issues when using Paired! Our teams were made aware of this bug and fixed it via a recent update. Please be sure that we're constantly working on improving how the app works so your feedback is greatly appreciated 🙏 If there's anything else you want to share, feel free to get in touch at support@paired.com", 'modified': '2022-08-08T16:51:47Z'}
review:
Update, they repaired the app and it is functioning correctly again. 
You need to buy the subscription to get any useful function. If you are committed to answering the questions openly and honestly, and then have face to face discussions with your partner, this app is worth it. If you won’t make the financial and in person time commitment, it won’t magically fix your relationship. 

Old : Main opening page is frozen It will not let you select anything. App is disabled in its current form.
title: It’s fixed - old: Do not pay for subscription until it’s fixed!

review: My fiancé and I love this app so much. There’s a monthly subscription of $5, but it’s shared between both partners and totally worth it. We’re constantly learning new things about each other and we’re able to talk about them and understand each other better. This app allows us to make sure we’re on the same page simply by making us answer questions. I truly feel like this app encourages growth together and bonding. It’s a delightful and fun experience for the both of us.
title: Life Changing!

developerResponse: {'id': 26415294, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review! We're so glad you're enjoying using Paired and the conversations it creates. 💜  Thanks also for being part of our community. If there's anything you need, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com! 🙌", 'modified': '2021-11-22T17:40:57Z'}
review:
I am so grateful for this app! We just have the free version and that’s been enough for us to have some really great conversations.

I love that seeing my partner’s answer is a fun little surprise every morning; we do it first thing. The questions are a good mix of sweet, fun, and sometimes tough.

Answering these has helped us be honest with each other in a safe environment, and has been a cool way for us to commit not just to each other but to the relationship we’re building together.
title: Has been pivotal in our relationship!

developerResponse: {'id': 35631974, 'body': "Hi there! Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about this. Our latest update fixed the issue where Free users weren’t able to reply to conversations on the Discuss tab when they missed the day the conversation first appeared. When you update your app, you should see that you can reply to conversations on the Discuss tab without being prompted to start a free trial. Please make sure to update your app to benefit from this fix, and don't hesitate to email us at suppport@paired.com if you have any questions 🙌\n", 'modified': '2023-03-28T10:26:24Z'}
review:
All in all, this is a pretty good couples app. The questions can overlap here and there, but there’s only so many absolutely unique questions you can ask and a little bit of overlap let’s you see if your partner is always answering honestly or if their views are changing.

A few months ago, this was a 4* app. But they made a change recently…..the chat no longer updates and you have to pay to answer past questions. It used to be if your partner answered a question and you missed it, you could still give your answer. Now they want $75 a year for that. Is it a good, fun app, sure, but it’s not worth $75. Save that for a date night!
title: Was Great, Then got money hungry

review:
My husband introduced this app to me, and so far, it's been great. However, I think it could benefit from including more fitness questions related to partner health and exercise.

My partner doesn't really take care of themselves, and they are quite sensitive. I find it challenging to approach them directly on this topic. It would be nice if there were a quiz within the app where I could communicate this to them indirectly. Interestingly, they seem to be more receptive to my responses through this app for some reason.
title: It’s great- needs more fitness/self care questions

developerResponse: {'id': 27635276, 'body': 'Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! It is a pleasure to see that using Paired has helped you maintain a strong relationship with your partner after moving back in with your families. I hope the app can continue sparking conversations between the two of you 💜\nIf there is anything else you would like to share, please feel free to contact us at support@getpaired.com - we will be glad to read more of your feedback ✨', 'modified': '2022-01-24T17:45:53Z'}
review:
Ever since my partner and I moved back in with our families, we did our best to maintain a strong relationship - then my partner found Paired. 
It’s made us both feel so much closer to eachother, in more ways than one. The questions, quizzes, and games on this app give insight into our relationship, and allow us to ask questions about eachother that we otherwise may not have considered. Overall, I’m having so much fun, and I’m always delighted to see what my partner does next
title: The next best intimacy

developerResponse: {'id': 23634962, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review. 🙌 We're so happy that Paired has helped prompt interesting conversations between you and your partner. 🥰\nRegarding your question about the Community feature, we did decide to remove the it from Paired in order to introduce a much more demanded feature: the Chat! \n\u2028If you have any questions about this, don’t hesitate to contact us at support@getpaired.com and we'll be able to answer your questions in more detail. 🙏", 'modified': '2021-06-28T16:33:58Z'}
review:
The app is great, it’s really worth the time and money.  My partner and I have been closer than ever and have used the topics in the app to be the basis to start conversations.

In the last update, they removed the ability to see the community comments.  I really enjoyed reading the comments from other users and have gained really valuable information.   I would really like if that was reinstituted as the community often had great ideas.
title: App is great, wish it still had one feature.

developerResponse: {'id': 25484744, 'body': "Thanks for your lovely review! We're so happy to hear Paired has been helpful in bringing you and your husband even closer together. 💗 If there's anything you need, you can always reach us at support@getpaired.com. Thanks again for being part of the Paired community! 🙌\n", 'modified': '2021-10-04T15:22:34Z'}
review: my husband has a hard time giving his opinions and worries about being judged and this has helped immensely! he feels like he has the time to formulate answers without being put on the spot and we’ve connected more than we have in a very long time. it’s also fun to see that even without talking about certain things, we have the same opinions, from life goals to parenting to our favorite color. i’m really floored about this app.
title: Connecting for the First Time in Forever

review: My SO and I love the app so far, we are brand new to the experience. It’s really fun to see each other’s answers. I think the biggest disappointment to both of us about the app is that past month question packs are locked behind premium…even packs from 5 months ago! There’s really not a whole lot free users can do outside of the welcome game and daily question, which isn’t great for people on a strict budget. I wish past months would become available to free users once a new month has started. Locking everything behind premium is such a huge turnoff.
title: Great so far, but…

review: This app is great for couples that make time to use it and make their relationship a priority. I enjoyed answering the daily questions and quizzes but my partner only participated once out of the week long trial. He never took the two minutes out of his day to try to better our relationship and instead would waste his time on tiktok or other social media. Sad I couldn’t see the full potential of this app but maybe in the future I can.
title: Great for couples that put forth effort

developerResponse: {'id': 36354535, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear you're having issues accessing the app, this shouldn't be happening. Our dedicated tech team is doing their best to improve the experience of users in the app - if you haven't done so yet, don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com so we can investigate this situation further 🙏\n", 'modified': '2023-05-05T17:23:27Z'}
review: I have been using paired for sometime with my boyfriend and it has been great. Apart from some repeated questions and the fact that we don’t get to do the games anymore (not premium) we haven’t had any complaints. But the other day the app just stopped working on my phone it wouldn’t load any questions or let me click on anything. I deleted and redownloaded the app and now it won’t even let me sign in it just shows a blank screen after I click sign in. It’s very very frustrating because previously we really liked the app.
title: Not working at all on my iPhone

review: Terrible app. $74 a year… 4 years later, a total of $300 invested for my wife to divorce me. I thought this app might be what we needed to finally get back on track, to bring our fizzled out love another spark. I wanted this app to turn our spark into a flame even. That was never the case. The app had totally made a mockery out of me turning what little we had left to utter shambles. Through one of our questions, my wife had popped the question I have been trying to avoid. Never in my life had I related more to Gwen Stefani. You and me… we used to be together. And to make matters worse she had finally informed me she’s been cheating on me for about a year now. And if she ever reaches out again I ain’t no hollaback girl.
title: My Wife Divorced Me

developerResponse: {'id': 25237676, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review! We've shared your comments with the rest of the team. 🙏 If there's anything else you'd like to share, you can always shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com. 🙌 Thanks also for being part of our community. We're glad you're enjoying using the app and hope it can bring you and your partner even closer together. 💜", 'modified': '2021-09-21T21:30:02Z'}
review: Instead of just using happy or unhappy faces to rate on a scale of how strongly we agree or disagree about a topic, make them two separate responses. For example, in response to the question “I can tell who my partner’s best friends are...” personally I can strongly agree that I know who his best friends are but how I feel about it is a different story. I feel unhappy about it unlike the big happy face that is associated in the app with “strongly agree”. On the other hand, this is a great app and I like to use it in hopes that my partner and I can better from it.
title: Couple Quizzes

review: I had saw this app on a TikTok, and thought it looked fun. My wife and I tried it out, and we are having a blast.  It went far beyond just surface level discussion. It’s improved our communication and shown us that even if we are going about things in different ways we still have the same goal. We had a stable relationship prior to the app, and it has just added another level of communication for both my wife and I.
title: Best thing I didn’t know I wanted.

developerResponse: {'id': 28044060, 'body': "Hi there! Thanks a lot for giving Paired a try and taking time to share your thoughts - it's a real joy to see that Paired has been improving your relationship with your fiancé.\nI hope you keep enjoying the conversations sparked by the app and if you have a moment to spare, please feel free to get in touch at support@getpaired.com - we'd love to hear your thoughts some more! 💜", 'modified': '2022-02-14T17:54:57Z'}
review: This app is awesome and creates consistency communicating in mine and my fiancés relationship. We both enjoy taking part, answering the questions and games thoroughly, then reading each other’s honest answer and having a discussion about it after. This app has not only brought us close but has reminded us and got one another back in touch with why we fell in love in the first place. 5/5 stars, highly recommend for any couple looking to strengthen their love and bond..!
title: Highly Recommend

developerResponse: {'id': 26825768, 'body': "Thanks so much for your lovely review! 🥰 We're so pleased you're enjoying using Paired. I hope we can help bring you and your partner even closer together. 💜 If there's anything we can do for you, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at support@getpaired.com.", 'modified': '2021-12-14T11:16:26Z'}
review: My husband suggested this app for us. Originally we were using one for veterans (we’re both veterans) and it just didn’t mesh well with us. He found this one and we’ve been using it for a few months. I love it because it always gives us something to discuss and helps us get into areas of each other’s minds we haven’t gone yet, or haven’t visited in a while. Sometimes the questions or quizzes are fun, sometimes practical, sometimes a bit of both.
title: Love it

developerResponse: {'id': 35639054, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review! We've shared your comments with the rest of the team.\xa0We hope the app can keep bringing you and your partner even closer 🙏\xa0If there's anything else you'd like to share, you can always shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com 💜\n", 'modified': '2023-03-28T16:10:23Z'}
review: The Paired app has been absolutely wonderful. So helpful, enlightening, and challenging. The communication brought forward by the questions and discussions have been so beneficial to our marriage already, and we only began using it a week ago. It may not be for every couple, because every relationship is obviously different, but it has been the perfect recipe for my wife and I to improve our communication and enhance our fulfillment of each other.
title: App Review

developerResponse:
{'id': 33836259, 'body': "Thanks a lot for sharing your thoughts about Paired 🙏 It's a pleasure to see that the app has been helpful to you and your partner. 

Your comments have been shared with the rest of the team, especially regarding adding an option to filter your discussions and having the possibility to see all the options when it comes to Games and multiple choice questions. 

In the meantime, we're also working on ways to personalize the content offered in the app, so that all couples can find what's most relevant to them and their relationships.

If there's anything else you'd like to share and you can spare the time, please don't hesitate to shoot us a note at support@paired.com 💜", 'modified': '2022-12-20T16:02:53Z'}
review:
I’m enjoying this app. It has fun questions and has started some new conversations in our 21 year relationship. Husband gets competitive on the games. However, I REALLY wish it showed more clearly where the discussions have started or been added to. Everything gets lost in a long list of completed tasks. A big giant heart appearing on it, it moving to another section, just some way of knowing it’s been commented on.

It’d be nice to filter out everything that isn’t relevant to us (traditional marriage. I don’t need anything trans or pronouns or anything like that, it’d be nice to move it out.) 

the activity tab isn’t working - it says we’ve played 10 games, there’s no way we’ve done that few. 

i’d also love to see the multiple choice questions with all the options again so we could actually discuss why we didn’t pick the other options.
title: Fun Couples App

review: The multiple answer questions are unlikely to provide an answer that you’d actually pick, it’s more of a pop culture quiz than anything. This app is nothing but a placebo to make you think you’re improving your relationship. It doesn’t do anything other than provide potentially confusing answers to questions that may not even be relevant to your relationship. I guess if you need to slap a bandaid on your relationship and pretend you’re improving communication, it’s fine. But if you’re looking to have honest and real conversations with your partner, it’s better just to prompt those conversations than to rely on an overhyped buzzfeed article that’s trying to pretend it’s not a “Cosmo” quiz in disguise.
title: Useless

developerResponse: {'id': 23910560, 'body': "Thanks for giving Paired a try. I'm sorry you didn't enjoy your experience. \nWe saw very low levels of activity on the Community feature we had available in the app previously and, after gathering feedback from different users through surveys, we realised that the majority of users were more interested in a chat feature which we decided to add to the app instead. \nRegarding your comments on the subscription price, we've tried to set a price that is both fair and representative of the expert content we've created with therapists and academics to make sure that we can help couples invest more in their relationship. If you feel that this isn't the case and you can spare a few minutes to share your feedback with us, please shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com. Thanks! 🙏", 'modified': '2021-07-13T17:46:38Z'}
review: This app is a great idea, and has a lot of potential, but needs a LOT of work. It’s prohibitively expensive for what it is, and non-intrusive banner advertising for romantic cruise packages and local therapists could help with that. Also, our favorite feature — community answers — is no longer a part of the app, and since that disappeared suddenly, we find ourselves using the app less and less.  In summery, it’s a great idea, not ready yet, and not worth the amount of money they are charging for the content provided in the premium package.
title: A good start.

developerResponse: {'id': 35634798, 'body': "I'm sorry to hear you encountered technical issues when exploring the app, this shouldn't be happening. Our dedicated teams are investigating the glitches you're reporting, and you should see improvements with the latest version of the app. If you can spare the time, please email us at support@paired.com so we can clarify this together 🙏\n", 'modified': '2023-03-28T12:42:19Z'}
review: I pay for the premium version of this app. For the first month or so, I really enjoyed it. The app was engaging and has been helpful in deepening my relationship with bae. However for the past month, the app has been INCREDIBLY glitchy. It runs slowly, crashes frequently, making the app very frustrating to use. Additionally, there are some other bugs linked to inconsistent reporting in the “your activity” screen & stats. For what I’m paying for the subscription, I’d expect a more stable app and certainly a more timely update to address the bugs that have been plaguing this app for the past month.
title: Serious Issues with App

developerResponse: {'id': 33837934, 'body': "I'm sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your experience with Paired - we'd be curious to hear more of your thoughts regarding the app. If you can spare the time, please send us an email at support@paired.com 🙏 We'd be grateful to discuss this further with you!\n", 'modified': '2022-12-20T17:22:10Z'}
review: You guys need to update your app with other options and then let us write about it. I just played a game that involved take out. The options you game me for most likely to order were not even close. There should of been a other button that considered your own food group. And the the question with the least options for take out were to of my favorite. You have your app really messed up and really not knowing each other. Some of the answers do not make sense. Like I said there should be an other option and then let you write a response. This app is not talored to me and my wife. I will be deleting the app and finding a  better app
title: The option button

developerResponse: {'id': 38174484, 'body': "Thanks so much for leaving us a review! We're glad you're enjoying using Paired and we hope we can continue to spark interesting and fun conversations with your partner to help you learn even more about each other ✨\nIf there's anything we can do for you, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com 🙏\n", 'modified': '2023-08-08T17:11:59Z'}
review: This app is so helpful; we have been together for 5 years and we started using this when we got engaged/married three years ago.  We do it every day and it has been so great as a tool to help us stay on the same page, learn things about each we may not have thought to ask, and stay connected and manage conflict and communication better.  This aligns well with Gottman methods and has so much research based resources as well.  Our marriage is strong; Paird helps us keep it that way.
title: Wonderful fun

developerResponse: {'id': 39824030, 'body': "Thanks so much for giving Paired a try! We're so happy you're enjoying using Paired and finding it helpful 🙌 \xa0If there's anything we can do for you, don't hesitate to contact us at\xa0support@paired.com! 🥰\n", 'modified': '2023-10-30T13:50:16Z'}
review: We’ve been married for 21 years and I’ve worked out of town for most of it.  This app has allowed us to have fun, insightful and meaningful conversations as well as a lot of fun!  I love the timeline feature and I love that you can ask your own questions!  I look forward to every update to see what is being improved and added.  Thank you for keeping our relationship interesting!
title: Helps my Wife and I stay connected

developerResponse: {'id': 33836419, 'body': "Thanks so much for your lovely review 🥰\xa0We're so pleased you're enjoying using Paired. I hope we can help bring you and your wife even closer together 💜 \xa0If there's anything we can do for you, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at\xa0support@paired.com 🙏", 'modified': '2022-12-20T16:09:25Z'}
review: My wife communicates with her phone quite often, whether for business or personal. I avoid using mine in order to remain present and aware of my surroundings. For us, that often times is recipe for less authentic communication in general. This app has been worth it. We’ve both learned how to connect with one another in new ways and better understand our relationship after having our first child.
title: Increases Connection!

developerResponse: {'id': 18277695, 'body': "We're thrilled to hear Paired has been helpful in your relationship! Thank you for leaving us a review and for being a part of our community. 💛💛💛", 'modified': '2020-10-05T12:10:58Z'}
review:
I think everyone who is doing long distance and are super busy in their life can relate to lacking that everyday connection with their partner. This app has been a wonderful new way for both of us to take a break in our day to think about each other, bring up some new thoughts, or simple smile. :) Its a great way to feel connected and let them know you are thinking about them even while you are living your busy life :)
Love the App!! 💛💛💛
title: A moment of connection in our busy days

developerResponse: {'id': 32624491, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback 🙏 \nI understand that some of the conversations offered in the app aren't relevant to your relationship. We're currently working on ways to personalize the content offered in the app, so that all couples can find what's most relevant to them and their relationships ✨ If there's anything else you'd like to share, please don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com — we always love to know what our users think of Paired!", 'modified': '2022-10-17T16:26:00Z'}
review: Me and my boyfriend have enjoyed this app a lot since we got it, but there’s been a pretty apparent problem. First of all: sometimes we don’t both get the same question, and second of all: if we A. Don’t get the same question, or B. Only one of us answers the question the day we get it, then it will stop the other from ever being able to answering, prompting them to get premium in order to respond. Super aggravating and makes the app frustrating to use.
title: It’s a great app! Except for when it’s not..

developerResponse: {'id': 38174174, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about Paired — we're sorry to hear you haven't enjoyed your experience. Your thoughts and comments have been shared with the rest of the team and we'll look into implementing these UX improvements in future updates!\n\nIf there's anything else you'd like to share in the meantime, we'd love to hear your thoughts. Don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com!", 'modified': '2023-08-08T16:49:47Z'}
review: Bugs! Main issue why I canceled is that partner and I answered multiple questions multiple times that appeared as “answered” in the list but would never show up when we tap them (other answers did, so not user error here). Poor UX: it’s also confusing where to start as there are multiple disjointed areas to “explore” but nothing really guiding you where to start.. and smaller misses like how long a training is, or even what that is… just a bunch of stuff not organized in any particular user journey. Just not mature enough to use without frustration yet.
title: Great concept but buggy and user experience poor

developerResponse: {'id': 33858834, 'body': "Hi there! Thank you for taking the time to try out the app and sharing this feedback following our recent update. With the free version of the app, you can access a question a day - this question is only available on the day of its release before getting locked again on the next day. I understand this wasn't what you expected - your thoughts have been forwarded to the rest of the team for further consideration. Feel free to email us at support@paired.com if you have any question 🙏", 'modified': '2022-12-21T14:33:55Z'}
review:
It was better before the update. Before if you answered the daily question but your partner didn’t, they could still answer it later. Now if they don’t answer it that day, the app won’t let them answer it. You have to pay in order to let the spouse answer the question. Frustrating. 

Some of the questions are helpful. It seems like there are too many questions about sex. Which the topic is good to discuss but i don’t want to talk about our sex life all the time. There is more to our relationship than that.
title: Better before the update

review: What a crying shame. This app is honestly something that could be great for couples, but the aspect of needing to pay YET ANOTHER subscription to answer questions, is just laughable. It’s a joke now, how many companies force you into these subscriptions, with the gaslighting explanation of “it’s not even that much a month”, until you’ve signed up for so many of them that your down a few 100, just because they want to bleed you. Me and my wife got a really big kick out of the three quizzes they allowed without paying the monthly fee and quickly deleted right after realizing we explored everything the app had to offer for us.
title: Just another “it’s only $X a month” subscription

review: I’m loving the app, however it feels too limited. If you don’t purchase the premium option, you only get to do one or two things a day on the app. There isn’t a bundle we can do for free daily or anything like that let alone a question we can answer daily within each category. If there were more free options, I feel like the app would be worth it, otherwise I feel like I’m being cornered into purchasing the premium to get any real enjoyment out of it.
title: Feels too limited

developerResponse: {'id': 27353518, 'body': "Thanks for your review! We've shared your comments with the rest of the team. 🙏 If there's anything else you'd like to share, you can always shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com. 🙌 ", 'modified': '2022-01-10T16:34:31Z'}
review:
Please help - we are currently distanced from each other. We can not converse right away in regulars to responses.  We are both enjoying the questions etc. However, we find it hard to communicate question by question. There is not an option to type a response or question to your partner once your partner answers. Also, having question of what “your” response is and what your think your partners response it, will help spark a conversation. 

Using the chat feature of difficult. It is too hard to follow a q&a sequence. 

Please make improvements.
title: Dear Developer!

developerResponse: {'id': 31361519, 'body': "Hi there! Thanks for giving Paired a try. I'm sorry that your wife is having issues with the games at the moment. We were made aware of this glitch, and released a fix via a recent update. If you both update your apps, you should see this issue disappear. If it isn't the case, or if there's anything else you want to discuss, you can always email us at support@paired.com ☺️", 'modified': '2022-08-09T10:24:47Z'}
review: My wife and I have had this app for 1 full day. We have had a lot of fun with it so far. At the moment we are unable to use the app because the app won’t let my wife progress with questions. She selects her answer and the game doesn’t progress her to the next page. Very frustrating since we are paying for this app. Other than that we love this app. Would get the 5th star if this issue wasn’t happening.
title: Good but crashes

developerResponse: {'id': 37825144, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to leave Paired a review — we're sorry that you've been having issues with your streak and answers not saving. If this still occurs on the latest version of the app, please email us at support@paired.com and we'll make sure to look into how to solve it for you 🙏", 'modified': '2023-07-21T15:33:02Z'}
review: I really want to like this app, but the amount of times it doesn’t load the daily question, or erases an answer I’ve put, or bugs out when I edit my answer and then won’t let me answer even though I already have and then gets rid of my streak. I’ve lost two near year long streaks because of bugs. Why have the streak system if it’s not accurate? It’s frustrating. And the couples questions repeat quite a bit, but I can give that a pass. Otherwise the app is fun. My partner and I have conversations we might not have had.
title: Buggy

developerResponse: {'id': 32624376, 'body': "Thanks a lot for your lovely feedback ✨ We understand you'd like to customize the notifications you receive from the app. I've passed it on to our dedicated teams so that we can review adding this feature to our upcoming projects - stay tuned 🙏\nIf there's anything else you'd like to share, please email us at support@paired.com", 'modified': '2022-10-17T16:19:47Z'}
review: Great app and it’s helped my boyfriend and I have interesting and important conversations, and have some we’ve never really thought of. However, you can’t filter out the type of push notifications you get — I only want for when my boyfriend answers questions. I don’t want notifications from the app to keep our streak, try the daily challenge, or to look at what they have to offer. It’s like getting ads for an app we already pay for.
title: Update push notifications

developerResponse: {'id': 27494085, 'body': "Thanks so much for leaving us a review! We're glad you're enjoying using Paired and we hope we can continue to spark interesting and fun conversations with your partner to help you learn even more about each other. ✨ If there's anything we can do for you, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com. 💜", 'modified': '2022-01-17T16:40:54Z'}
review: Honestly this app happy by surprise the first quiz really had us both in the conversations about multiple parts of our life together. These conversations were like them I know there’s deep rooted in my soul and body emotionally connected in every way. After all set and done I was more eager to dive into the app and discover what else me and my partner can learn about each other. I can definitely tell after the first quiz the love has definitely grown.
title: The first Quiz.

review: The questions are great, but the design is overwhelming and cluttered. I would like it if the chat was rearranged so you could reply to specific answers or else allow that to happen within each activity. The point is to start good conversations right? But they make it difficult to do anything more than just read your partners reply. The Home Screen is so jam packed it’s hard to know where to start and difficult to get ones bearings. It could be streamlined for sure. Overall, it’s kind of fun, but I wouldn’t pay for it.
title: Good concept but needs work

review: My partner and I have been together for 3 months and have had the Premium app a little over a week and already it has sparked conversations that have led to deeper discussions about all facets of life. I am almost afraid that eventually we will run out of questions and quizzes because we enjoy it so much! We are hoping that new content will be added or some other creative avenue to bring us closer and continue to enjoy this app!
title: Fun and Informative

developerResponse: {'id': 26872047, 'body': "Thanks so much for your lovely review! 🥰 We're so pleased you're enjoying using Paired. I hope we can help bring you and your partner even closer together. 💜 If there's anything we can do for you, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at support@getpaired.com.", 'modified': '2021-12-16T11:24:12Z'}
review: This app has allowed me and my partner to connect and have conversations that may have been difficult to discuss in the past. The trick for this app is to be as real and honest in your responses to make the most progress together. After two weeks of using it, my partner and I bought the year subscription. Sometimes we use the conversation points for date night or dinner. I highly recommend this app.
title: Get intimate

developerResponse: {'id': 29577978, 'body': "Hi Sarah,\nThanks a lot for giving Paired a try and leaving us a review! I hope the app will help you and your partner through deployment. I'll make sure to pass on your suggestions to our dedicated team for review 🙏\nIf you wish to get more information about your subscription, or if you have any questions at all, don't hesitate to contact us at support@paired.com so we can look into it together 💜", 'modified': '2022-05-05T15:37:34Z'}
review:
I like it and it’s helping to keep us connected through deployment the last few days. Suggestion would be to add some military packs. This is such a missed opportunity. 

Also the subscription was a little misleading. It said 7 day free trial but I was charged the day I signed up even though it said I’d be charged the next week. I didn’t see where you had the option to sign up for anything other than annually so I was charged $60. Idk it hasn’t been a week yet so idk why I was charged.
title: I like it

developerResponse: {'id': 26037996, 'body': "Thanks so much for leaving such valuable feedback! 🙏 We're very happy to hear that Paired has a positive influence on your relationship 💟  I'll certainly pass your suggestion on to the team!", 'modified': '2021-11-02T14:15:48Z'}
review: The questions are good and it only takes a moment to go in and answer. The answers can set you up for conversations and maybe make it a little bit easier to have those conversations after you answer a sensitive question. The only thing that I think would make it better is if it gave some conversation starting tips here and there or automatically prompt for conversing after the weekly test when the answers are different.
title: It’s been helpful

developerResponse: {'id': 23631711, 'body': "Thanks so much for your lovely review. 🙌 We're so pleased you're enjoying using Paired. Thanks also for taking the time to share your feedback with us, we'll make sure to pass your suggestion along to the rest of the team. In the meantime, in the latest version, every time your partner answers a question, quiz, etc, a notification should appear in the Chat which could help! But if there's anything else you need or you have more suggestions you'd like to share with us, please don't hesitate to shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com. 💜", 'modified': '2021-06-28T13:43:21Z'}
review: I love everything this app has to offer. Has brought my girl and me so much closer. My only wish is that I could have a button to click that will tell me what questions she has answered that I haven’t. A “shortcut” per say. :] but other than that, absolutely amazing. Gets us to answer things with giving us the space to not have to take our answers to heart. Gives us fine to answer truthfully while the other person has time to think before “retaliating” and to take it to heart.
title: Great app

review: My boyfriend is deployed and we use the app to make sure we’re still talking about our relationship and feelings even when days are difficult. However since he’s over 12 hours ahead of me, sometimes if he logs on the app sends him a question ahead of me. So we get two in one day and none the next. It’s a bit odd to explain. Other than that it’s been fun even if we don’t have $70 for the advanced features.
title: Great for long distance but odd for different time zones

developerResponse: {'id': 32557167, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review and giving Paired a try!\xa0💜\xa0We hope you're enjoying using the app. If there are any more thoughts you'd like to share, either regarding the pricing or the app in general, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com.\xa0🙏", 'modified': '2022-10-13T14:39:07Z'}
review:
My wife and I have had this app for about nine months now and like it a lot! It has helped us to have better communication and more opportunities to discuss things that we normally wouldn’t have.
However, the app seems to be more directed towards unmarried, dating couples. I wish there was more content for those are that are married and have children. I actually haven’t come across any content that is directed toward that kind of demographic. Thank you!
title: Premium member; mostly good with some suggestions

developerResponse: {'id': 38174249, 'body': "Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts about Paired! We understand that you'd like to see more nuanced answers in quizzes and games, and our teams will consider this for our upcoming projects 🙏 If you need anything else in the meantime, don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com", 'modified': '2023-08-08T16:55:17Z'}
review: This app is helping my boyfriend and I get to know each other and engage in important topics we might otherwise not have talked about. But the games and quizzes need more nuanced answer options such as the ability to pick more than one answer or the options “all of the above” or “none of the above.” Otherwise the answers are too black and white for real world relationships and people, who are complicated and multi-faceted.
title: Super helpful app but needs some small improvements

developerResponse: {'id': 31366667, 'body': "Thanks so much for leaving us a review! review:
I was recommended this app by a friend and I would be lying if I didn’t say that during the time period that we’ve been using it, it has slightly made our relationship change gears for the better. It has highlighted what areas we need work in and shown us some examples of exactly what we should improve.
I’d recommend the app if the price isn’t an issue for you. Or At least for the trial period.
title: Helped my relationship

title: We didn’t even know

title: We love the app!

developerResponse: {'id': 32168162, 'body': 'Hi, sorry to hear you’ve lost your progress! Please contact us at support@paired.com and we can then investigate further. 🙏', 'modified': '2022-09-22T09:35:47Z'}
review:
My husband and I have been using this app since before we got engaged. It’s been great! 
Sadly, one of us got a new phone and it won’t let us see all our previous progress. 
(Without buying a membership-which is not worth it in my opinion) 
Is there a way to get all the old answers and conversations to the new phone? (Without any monetary purchase) 
Besides all of that confusion I really like the app, it brought up topics that I wouldn’t of thought of myself.
title: Great but confusing

review: This app is great, overall a good couples bonding and really helps. But in order to really connect and communicate with your partner in this app, is by paying. U get ONE conversation a day, i don't know about you but one convo a day def wont heal rocky relationships. If this app is supposed to help couples, don't you think itd be made more accessible? This app doesn't seem like it wants to help you, just wants your money. I can see making some stuff part of the premium, but having everything except one is just ridiculous. And the fact that i really thought about buying premium. Just a scam
title: if ur broke, so will ur relationship be

developerResponse: {'id': 27036752, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We're sorry you ran into problems whilst using Paired. Please contact us directly at support@getpaired.com and we can look into this for you 🙏", 'modified': '2021-12-24T12:59:44Z'}
review: When I first started using their app it was fine, but then it started to not keep track of streaks. Now the app is completely frozen and you cannot click anything to get any sort of action. I’m just glad I did not pay any money towards this app, I feel bad for those who did. Also, the app kept saying my paired partner completed a premium quiz, which he did not. So it’s like the app is trying to bait me to buy premium to see his answer 😂. Chat for me and partner does not load anymore. Lots of issues. The notifications also tell me I did not answer the daily question when I did. It’s a whole mess….
title: App is completely frozen on top of many issues

developerResponse: {'id': 24601921, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you're having issues with the app, this should not be happening. If you haven't yet gotten in touch with our team, please do get in touch with us at support@getpaired.com so we can help further. 🙏\n", 'modified': '2021-08-19T13:47:54Z'}
review: I was really excited and was hoping we could become daily users, my husband and I just had our first baby and we need something like this. We tried the free version and loved it so we subscribed. It works great on my iPhone but for some reason after subscribing the app does not work well on my husband’s google phone. It constantly freezes when he’s trying to write in an answer box or do a quiz. Tried closing the app, restarting the phone, uninstalling the app and nothing. Such a bummer!
title: So fun if it works for both your phones!

developerResponse: {'id': 35633715, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review! We've shared your comments with the rest of the team.\xa0We hope the app can keep bringing you and your partner even closer 🙏\xa0If there's anything else you'd like to share, you can always shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com 💜\n", 'modified': '2023-03-28T11:48:46Z'}
review: My partner and I (premium accounts) really enjoy that each question, game, quiz, etc. has its own Discussion chat to giggle or connect further over answers. We are brought closer and closer together by the wide variety of topics. We also like the updates for satisfaction updates being filled hearts versus smile or frown faces. Sometimes responses/questions can be confusing but nothing’s perfect and this app is great as is!
title: User-friendly and fun

review:
I don’t usually write reviews, but this app seems to really open up my partner and I to communicate our issues, while also helping us to get to know each other a more. The “conversations” and “games” are vast, fun, and we find ourselves spending a ton of time using this app together. 

I definitely recommend this for serious couples who are out of their “puppy love” faze. It’s been very helpful to us so far!
title: Opens up communication

Thanks for your interest in Paired and for sharing feedback on your experience with our Support team 🙏 We're so happy that we could help you when you changed phones and we hope that we can continue to spark interesting and fun conversations with your partner to help you learn even more about each other ✨\nIf there's anything we can do for you, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com!", 'modified': '2022-04-21T13:49:33Z'}
review: I just recently got a new phone and since I only had a guest account, me and my partners information wasn’t loading when they transferred everything from my old phone onto my new one. review: I’ve really been enjoying sparking fun prompted conversation with my boyfriend for the last month or so. It’s really helped us learn about each other, even though we’ve already been together for 3 years lol. Although with the recent update, if he answers a question and I miss it by not answering the day of, there’s no way to ever respond or see his answer, and this feels pointless and somewhat counter-intuitive to the communication prompted by the app. I’ll keep using the app, but this part is frustrating for both parties
title: Cute but complicated

developerResponse: {'id': 22984765, 'body': "Hi there, thanks so much for leaving us a review and for your support of Paired. Hopefully that explains it a bit better for you. But if you have any other questions or feedback, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com.", 'modified': '2021-05-24T18:31:49Z'}
review:
I wish there was an option to watch ads in order to access the advice columns, as I can’t really afford the entire membership and didn’t realize if I read all my “free” journals the first day I got the app, I wouldn’t have any more to use. 
It would be wonderful if those without a membership could access two or even one journal a day that pertains most to a situation regarding themselves and their partner that could help strengthen their bond.
title: Love the quizzes and questions but...

title: Buggy

review: Me and my boyfriend just do the daily free question, and we love it! It’s great for where we are at (about two years into dating, and planning on getting married within the next few). It helps us think about and talk about things that we wouldn’t ourselves, which helps us give value to each others opinions. I think this app will greatly help my relationship long term.
title: Lovely little daily habit

developerResponse: {'id': 27633620, 'body': "Thanks so much for your review! We've shared your comments regarding the ongoing streak and the absence of rewards with the rest of the team - thanks for your suggestion 🙏 If there's anything else you'd like to share, you can always shoot us a note at support@getpaired.com. 🙌 ", 'modified': '2022-01-24T16:24:07Z'}
review:
Great concept for the app. My wife and I enjoy answering a question a day. However, I can’t give 5 stars because of the lack of pricing options and the fact that we are on a 61 day streak and don’t get rewarded with anything besides seeing a flame and the steak counter go up. 

There should be some rewards to unlock extra content based on your streak. Like every 7 days we get 2 or 3 crowns to unlock extra content of our choosing. This would give us an insight to what premium is about and give us more incentive to upgrade.
title: No Rewards for Streaks

developerResponse: {'id': 35634227, 'body': "Thanks a lot for taking the time to share your thoughts regarding the layout of the Discuss tab.
