review: I paid for premium and it said it would be 4$ it ended up taking the whole year out of my account. $86.00 exactly. Crazy. I would give 5 stars but the payment in full caught me off guard when you are told on the app how much it is monthly, but paying for the full year upfront was crazy.

developerResponse: {'id': 39641195, 'body': "We're sorry you haven't been able to set up your profiles properly in the app, this shouldn't be happening.\nPlease email us at support@paired.com with your profile details so that we can look into this further and help you fix these issues 💜", 'modified': '2023-10-20T16:14:48Z'}
review:
Scammers taking my money.

You guys took my money for the $74.99 yearly subscription, but the app won’t update to allow me to “unlock” any questions. I’m stuck in the starter screen. 
Yes, I updated the app through the app store. 
I tried to send my husband the code to join me, and it says the code isn’t valid. 
He tried to send ME a code and it says that code isn’t valid either! 
I will be reporting this as fraud to my bank and getting my money back because holy crap. 

Complete waste of my time. Don’t download this app!!
title: Total Scam

review: I signed up for the free 7 day trial, cancelled on the 5th day and was charged three days later for the annual fee of $79.00! I have submitted a refund request, answer is “pending”. I am upset that this app ignored my request to cancel and charged my card without authorization.
title: Charged my account for annual

review: This app says it’s like 14.99 a month but what they don’t tell u is they charge you for the WHOLE YEAR WITHOUT your permission instead of monthly!!!!
title: Don’t do it!!!!

developerResponse: {'id': 35638893, 'body': "Thank you for trying out the app and taking the time to share your thoughts about Paired 🫶 We're so happy to hear that Paired has been helpful while navigating long distance with your partner! If there's anything else you'd like to share, please don't hesitate to email us at support@paired.com 💜", 'modified': '2023-03-28T16:00:10Z'}
review:
I’ve been with my boyfriend 2 years now and we just went long distance a few weeks ago. I felt that I wasn’t receiving love in the way I want, which is my second main love language which is Words of Affirmation, which is much needed now because we can’t spend as much quality time together as before when we lived together. 

We just tried out the free trial and I rate it 10/10, honestly it exceeded my expectations and I am very happy with this app. We are able to connect more by words, have conversations and think about different subjects we normally wouldn’t have brought up on our own since this gives prompts and it’s super easy to fill out one quiz or pack per day and talk about it later on, over the phone. It’s brought us together over the short time we’ve had this app, so when the 7 day free trial, I was ready to pay the $74.99 for the yearly subscription no doubt, it’s 100% worth it to me, BUT when they offered me a 40% discount to subscribe for the whole year for only $44.99, I couldn’t be happier! I re subscribed RIGHT AWAY after our free trial ended. 

I 100% reccomend this app to anyone, ESPECIALLY those in long distance relationships!!! So happy I found Paired! 🫶🏽
title: Great for long distance couples!

developerResponse: {'id': 38174571, 'body': "Hi there!\n\nWe do offer both a yearly and a monthly plan to our Premium subscription — don't hesitate to visit our website or email us at support@paired.com if you need any help!", 'modified': '2023-08-08T17:19:11Z'}
review: The app itself is great but after the 7 day trial it said it would cost only a couple dollars a month and it did not specify that it would take 79.99 from my account…it would have been nice if I could have paid monthly not for the whole year.
title: Ok app

developerResponse: {'id': 37207978, 'body': "Sorry you didn't enjoy your experience with Paired. We do have a free version that allows you to answer a question a day and a quiz on Sundays. But if you do want to access all content ever added to the app at any time, you would indeed need to purchase a premium subscription. If you have any questions about this, don't hesitate to contact us at\xa0support@paired.com.", 'modified': '2023-06-19T13:41:56Z'}
review: I don’t understand why this app is free at all. You have to be a premium user to access anything. The month subscription price is $14.99! It’s either that or commit to the yearly plan of $79. Either way; I’m not paying for premium when I don’t even know if I’ll like the content. Ps. You don’t get a 7-day free trial unless you agree to the yearly subscription in advance. Which is very shady business. We all know lots of people forget to cancel their subscriptions. This is very intentional on the company’s behalf as they are trying to get $80 from people who are likely to forget. I can only imagine the red tape you’d have to go through to get that kind of refund.
title: Switch and bait

developerResponse: {'id': 37007746, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you were unexpectedly charged! If you haven't done so yet, please shoot us a note at support@paired.com and we'll investigate how to help you best!", 'modified': '2023-06-08T15:33:29Z'}
review: The app itself has pretty cool quizzes and questions but I just downloaded it to try it out with my husband but I have since canceled my subscription because when I installed the app there was an offer for a 7. Day free trail. I was billed the $14.99 the same day that I downloaded the app and now even though I have requested a refund and canceled the subscription apple has denied my refund request. I’m glad I did not pick on of the more expensive plan options. To make matters worse, the app developer contacted me to tell me that the 7day trail does not apply if you choose to have a monthly membership?  Any other app allows you have subscribe but still have the free trail as well.  This was a really disappointing experience. It’s sad because the app was a good way to get us talking again.
title: Buyer beware!

review: My husband and I have been using this app for about a year. Great app but thinking about not using it anymore. We pay the 60.00 a month and it’s very serious to us when we lose a streak. However, it has happened twice that we answer the daily question and lose are streak. Why is that? Please help
title: Streak

review:
The app itself is cute and fun.   Lots of activities to improve and learn more about your relationship.   It’s definitely worth it.

However, my partner and I decided not to do it, and was still charged $74.99 even after I had pressed cancelled and end subscription.    There was no way to contact them to resolve the issue either.

Great app tho!
title: Cute!!

review:

Love this app, my bf and I use it every day, just super buggy as of 2/18/23
title: Great app, fix lag and bugs please

developerResponse: {'id': 35638541, 'body': 'Hi there! Thanks a lot for giving Paired a try. We were made aware of recent performance issues, and this should now be fixed 🙏 If it’s not the case and your app is up to date, please email us at support@paired.com so we can have a closer look at your situation 😊\n', 'modified': '2023-03-28T15:40:42Z'}
review: The app content is great and my BF and I have made some significant strides with communication because of this app; BUT, their servers seem slow/laggy, we are constantly being kicked off so I’m guessing others can get on, but once we are able to connect I have no doubt others are being booted. This has been a constant cycle since day 1 (Feb 17-18) and is not improving at all which points to inadequate servers. If you are considering this app; don’t. Find another one. The frustration caused by the constant connect/disconnect cycle is not only annoying, but has caused issues between BF and I thinking the other is not on the app at the same time and is not actively participating; which is not true, but seems that way because of the ridiculous connect/laggy/disconnect cycle. We are using brand new Apple and Android devices so it cannot be blamed on our devices.
title: Terrible servers

developerResponse: {'id': 34337373, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review and giving Paired a try!\xa0💜\xa0We hope you're enjoying using the app. If there are any more thoughts you'd like to share, don't hesitate to shoot us a note at\xa0support@paired.com.\xa0🙏\n", 'modified': '2023-01-17T14:39:26Z'}
review: I’m glad they give you a week to try for free. And also getting the premium membership that includes premium for your partner is a good deal for an app like this. It wouldn’t make sense to have to purchase two different subscriptions. I have apple and my spouse has android and the app bugs out on him a lot which is frustrating and I think may need to be better optimized for android. Overall we are liking the app so far and I guess we will see if we are willing to use it for more than a week and pay monthly for premium.
title: So far it’s good

title: Pointless don’t get

Thanks!\xa0\n", 'modified': '2023-03-28T12:11:12Z'}
review:
$75 a year? Most expensive game of 21 questions ever.

I love my S/O but this should really have 30 days free, THEN smack me with a paywall. Not “hey subscribe with free trial and we will cross our fingers you forget!”

This is 70% the cost of Spotify, and Spotify has to pay music royalties.  

App also signs you up for emails without asking. That’s just rude. 

Boo do better.
title: Overpriced

review: I logged in with my apple account. I didn’t agree to any subscriptions. And they took 74.99 out bc I had it linked to apple and my credit card. I went and asked for a refund bc I don’t even use the app and I didn’t subscribe to anything and they told me that was not possible.
title: Took money

review:
1. 7 days are not free, I got charged on the 7th day, unable to cancel.
2. It is 75.99 PER PERSON for the premium package. There is no app that is worth $150 for a year. 

I have reached out to the developer, we’ll see how they respond. One not happy customer. It is a good app with good information but not worth over $10 a month.
title: Way too expensive

developerResponse: {'id': 35631849, 'body': "Hi there - thank you very much for taking the time to share your thoughts regarding Paired, its content and its pricing. Your feedback was shared with the rest of the team and we'll make sure to take your comments into consideration in our upcoming projects 🙏 We hope that you and your wife will keep enjoying the Premium features of Paired, and please email us at support@paired.com if you'd like to share anything else 💜", 'modified': '2023-03-28T10:20:04Z'}
review: First, the app is too expensive. Don’t say $49.99 or whatever, say it’s $1.99 a month, that’s easier to accept. Second, some of the quizzes that you get graded on with your partner are subjective. “On a scale of 1-5, how likely are you to…” and when you choose 4 but your wife says you would choose 3, it doesn’t look like you know eachother as much as you should. I like the daily questions and question packs, and I like guessing what my wife answered. She asked for the premium app again, and that’s the only reason I bought the subscription after the 7 day trial.
title: Okay, but misses the mark

developerResponse: {'id': 34332412, 'body': "I'm sorry to hear you were charged twice for Paired Premium - this shouldn't happen! Your report was forwarded to the rest of the team and we'll definitely work on fixing this glitch so that users aren't charged twice for Premium 🙏 \nIn the meantime, don't hesitate to get in touch with Apple support to request a refund if your purchase was made via your Apple ID. Our teams are also available to help if you need anything - feel free to email us at support@paired.com for more guidance on this topic!", 'modified': '2023-01-17T11:22:59Z'}
review: I was loving this app for me and my wife all year long until, they charged us both 59.99. When I started paired I paid 59.99 for the year and was under the assumption that it was only 59.99 per couple. My wife was never charged for the first year, just the one flat fee of 59.99 was taken out. Well my year was up and they charged me 59.99 for another year which was fine, I was enjoying the app and didn’t mind paying it. Two weeks after they took 59.99 out of my checking account, they turned around and took another 59.99 from my wife, we share the same account so it basically came out twice. This was very misleading! The app for sure is worth the 59.99 a year, but it is not worth 120.00 a year by far. I will be canceling my subscription before next year again because I refuse to pay 120.00 a year for this app. Otherwise the app itself is good and has brought me and my wife very close. It’s just not worth 120.00. I was under the assumption it would charge 59.99 per couple, as it never charged my wife the 59.99 last year. Very misleading!!! Not a happy customer at all.
title: Overcharging

review: Would strongly prefer to give less than one star. My partner and I were looking forward to using an app like this to benefit our communication and gave this a try. Was absolutely horrified on using it to find that the developers of this app for “couples” promote “group sex, multi-partner, and threesomes” in nearly every question or game regarding partner intimacy making it obviously unusable. Anyone who would even consider such disgusting, dehumanizing acts while they’re in a relationship should not be in a relationship of any kind with anyone, and the developers of the paired app clearly encourage it. What part of the word “paired” makes them think intercourse with someone other than your parter would be positive in a relationship, it completely baffles the mind. These people claiming to know or care a single thing about human relationships should seek immediate counseling and dissolve their own fake “partnerships” in their own lives immediately.

review: I wanna know why it’s $160 for this app. Why do you charge PER PERSON!? When it’s connected..? I deleted my account and the app because they act like it’s a few bucks a month no they hit you with the $79.99 all at per person $80 for yourself $80 for them, okay, but we cannot afford to spend $160 on an APP rn so I kindly deleted it. They keep trying to charge me 5 times a day after deleting. I can’t even put money in my account bc of this. So don’t do the free trial if y’all can’t afford to pay $160 for it. If they had charged 6-7 a month ($14 a month) like it said I would’ve kept it. I actually enjoyed this app and I was going to re download it when I could afford it. But seeing that they’re still trying to charge each of our deleted apps a week later runs me the wrong way. It is also ridiculous to me that it’s per person. If you can afford to blow $180 then it’s a fun app for you and your partner but I wouldn’t say it’s like counseling

Cannot recommend highly enough, even just the free version is amazing!

title: BEWARE!

review:
I don’t usually write reviews. I think total I might have like 3-4 reviews on this thing but this one I had to write. 

I see there are people talking about issues with the app such as results not being loaded up. For that one all you have to do is close the app and restart it for me I haven’t had any of those issues except for once and I found out it was cause I had. an internet outage in my area at the time I was doing a quiz, but all is well.

For people complaining about paying a subscription for premium you obviously don’t realize what your getting for that price and your don’t have to choose monthly. Why pay 14.99 per month when you can pay 59.99 per year? I use this app every single day to answer quizzes with my partner and we use this app to talk about our relationship when I’m at work. It’s a great tool to use to track all the issues or non issues in our relationship if I want to discuss something more in depth in our relationship I can go to the app and I have all the answers from previously asked questions all right there.

This app is priceless (even though there is a price) but I look at it as investing in my relationship I don’t care about a 60 bucks a year payment when it’s $60 towards my relationship this app have quizzes, experts that have advice and it’s broken down by specific categories ranging from finances, intimacy, fun/excitement, and many other topics. If you can’t afford $60 bucks don’t break your bank, but if you can then I say it’s well worth it. Also there’s a 7 day free trial to gauge whether you want to continue with a subscription or not and after 3 days me and my partner knew we were buying it we even took 2 extra days to make sure, or we would have canceled the subscription. Like I said before this app is priceless (even though it has a price)

If you wanna buy activity books, make questions yourself, or whatever for you and your spouse to use. That’s fine but that’s not all this app has to offer they have activities, quizzes, but also there are articles and above from relationship experts for you to read over, and all that for $60 bucks a year or try out the 7 day free trial.

Thank you for your time.

@iamkingrvla on all social media
title: INVESTMENT IN YOIR RELATIONSHIP
